title: Addressing Risks From Susman Godfrey
summary: Executive Order 14263, issued on April 9, 2025, addresses risks associated with Susman Godfrey LLP, a law firm alleged to undermine American interests. The order prohibits access to national secrets for lawyers and firms engaged in detrimental activities and outlines measures to suspend security clearances for Susman employees pending review. It mandates government agencies to cease provisions of goods and services to Susman and requires contractors to disclose any business dealings with the firm. The order emphasizes the need to prevent the use of taxpayer dollars to support activities like racial discrimination and seeks to align agency funding with national priorities. Additionally, it restricts federal hiring from Susman unless deemed safe for national security. The overarching goal is to safeguard American interests and uphold the integrity of federal operations.
